title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When inputting new Date() as content for three items and saving, the expected behavior is that all three items should show the same format. However, when previewing the items, the observed behavior is that the data and text item show the same format, but the dynamic text item displays a different format.
EB: The expected behavior is that all three items, the data item, text item, and dynamic text item, should display the same format when inputting new Date() as content and saving. Specifically, the dynamic text item should display the same format as the data and text items.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Input new Date() as content for all three items
2. Save the items
3. Preview the items and compare the format displayed by the data item, text item, and dynamic text item.
